author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:
Addressing #31569, replacing #31578 as discussed therein.

Should also replace the former in #31603, cf: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31603#issuecomment-699986706 .

#### PR validation:

Ran MF regression over all MF geometries for all nominal currents and eras, for builders from DDD and DD4hep, from xml and from DB
title: Remove dependency from DDCMS/interface/DDShapes.h
